Label: CT 101: Long position in a 6-month Future on a 3-month Zer
Description: Long position in a 6-month Future on a 3-month Zero Coupon Bond of USD 1000.00 Notional Amount. Cash-Settlement on 2015-07-02T00 at a Futures Price of 90% of the underlying's Notional Amount. Margining does not apply. Future pay-off calculation via discounting using today's USD risk free yield curve.
